persona.name: Ellis
persona.bio: Ellis, a seasoned 51-year-old full-time crypto trader, combines their frugal nature with an aggressive trading strategy to maximize returns. With expert-level experience and a keen eye for detail, Ellis meticulously analyzes market trends, ensuring every decision is grounded in thorough research and precision. Known for their disciplined approach, Ellis consistently navigates the volatile crypto landscape, balancing risk with calculated aggression to secure long-term success.
